14122321.content:
"Well, it's kind of the reason you have a flat chest, it's mine actually." You say blushing.
"Okay I have several questions." Jill starts.
"One, did you hit your head?, two, even if you did do that, why didn't you just tell me and three, did you touch it?" Jill said with a red face.
"No, because I wanted to make sure it worked before looking like a fool and I wouldn't want to test it out on anyone else and not really." You say back defending yourself.
"Well you still sound like a fool, prove it." Jill states.
"How?" You ask.
"Swap us, with both of us aware." Jill said.

You instruct her to hold on to the device as you give it a spin, explaining the details of how it works.
The device slowly comes to a stop and ends up landing on...
14122321.title: Tell the truth

choices: She doesn’t want to risk swapping more, so she declines
She is actually happy about her new crotch, since it matches her masculine chest
She wants to try again, she really wants breasts, even if she loses more parts
141223214.content:
Seeing it land on ‘genital swap’, you find your crotch changing into a vagina, and your boxers changed into panties. Jill was shocked to find the opposite happening to her own crotch.

“Oh my god!” She grabbed her new package in shock.

“Well that didn’t go as planned. I guess I’m technically a girl now.” You hid a smirk while Jill looked at your crotch to see the bulge was gone. This wasn’t planned, but your new body parts felt strangely...well, they felt different, but not in a bad way. “Wanna try it again?”
141223214.title: Genital swap.

1412232143.content:
"I'd like to try again, I wouldn't mind swapping some other things." Jill smiled.
"Sure, same here." You say as you once again put the exchanger in place an you both hold it as it spins.
"What are you hoping it lands on?" You ask Jill.
"Chests." Jill said blushing.
"My breasts would look good on you." You smile back, knowing the truth.

You both eagerly wait for the exchanger to see what it lands on and what you'll be trading with each other this time.
As the dial comes to a stop, it lands on.....

141223221.title: Lie about what part you swappd

141223222.content:
"I haven't used it yet. I thought maybe we could try it together." You say as convincingly as you can.
"It could be fun to have your chest, I would love to have breasts." She says excitedly.
"We can't really decide what we swap unless it lands on the option that lets us choose, so it isn't without risk." You clarify.
Jill takes a moment to look over you.

"What are you doing?" You ask confused.
"Just checking how big of a risk it would actually be." Jill laughed.
"And?" You ask curious.
"I'd be happy to at least try almost any swap we could possibly have." Jill said.
"Glad you think so, same here." You smile back as you grab the exchanger and tell Jill to hold on and spin the exchanger.

You both eagerly wait for the dial to stop as it eventually lands on...
141223222.title: Lie and say you never swapped
